item.title: EPCOT Theme Park | Walt Disney World Resort
item.description: Celebrate culture, nature and human progress at EPCOT. Enjoy innovative attractions, savor international flavors, and discover exciting seasonal festivals.

item.title: Disney World Attractions & Rides | Walt Disney World Resort
item.description: Entertainment at CommuniCore Plaza Stage EPCOT Today's Performance Time: 5:30 PM to 8:30 PM Live Entertainment

item.title: Tickets, Annual Passes & Vacation Packages | Walt Disney World Resort
item.description: Disney After Hours at EPCOT Select Nights January 22 to September 24, 2026 Explore a world of possibilities at EPCOT during a limited-capacity event with yummy snacks and lower wait times for select attractions.

item.title: World Discovery - EPCOT - Walt Disney World Resort
item.description: Travel through space and time with Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Rewind at EPCOT in Walt Disney World Resort, near Orlando, Florida.

item.title: Special Events & Tours - Walt Disney World Resort
item.description: Behind the Seeds EPCOT Today's Hours: 10:30 AM, 11:30 AM, 12:30 PM, 1:30 PM, 2:30 PM, 3:30 PM, 4:30 PM

item.title: EPCOT International Festival of the Holidays - Walt Disney World Resort
item.description: Celebrate holidays around the world during EPCOT International Festival of the Holidays, a spirited seasonal festival at Walt Disney World Resort.

item.title: Special Offers, Deals & Discounts | Walt Disney World Resort
item.description: 3-Day, 3-Park Ticket with admission to Disney’s Hollywood Studios, EPCOT and Disney’s Animal Kingdom theme park only; not valid for admission to Magic Kingdom park

item.title: Remy’s Ratatouille Adventure at EPCOT | Walt Disney World Resort
item.description: Join Chef Remy on a culinary adventure. Shrink and race through Gusteau’s kitchen on Remy’s Ratatouille Adventure, located in the France Pavilion at EPCOT.

item.title: Journey of Water, Inspired by Moana - Walt Disney World Resort
item.description: Experience Journey of Water, Inspired by Moana, and immerse yourself in the exploration of the water cycle with playful, interactive elements.

item.title: EPCOT International Festival of the Arts
item.description: Come celebrate the visual arts, performing arts and culinary arts during EPCOT International Festival of the Arts at Walt Disney World Resort in Florida.
